pages.text: From the leaves of $(l:general/gemstone_powder)gemstone powder$() dyed trees$() you could obtain absolutely pure color spectrums. These spectrums themselves are magical and embody the elements of nature, composed of their original forms $(bold)$(c_magenta)TIME$(), $(bold)$(c_yellow)ENERGY$() and $(bold)$(c_cyan)MATTER.$().
The darkest material you have ever held in your hands.$(br2)$(c_black)Black$() represents the Nothingness of the $(italic)Void$(), $(italic)Power$() and $(italic)Mystery$().

Holding this item in your hand gives you a sign of security. Of course, all nonsense, after all, they are only spectrums. But still...$(br2)$(c_blue)Blue$() represents $(italic)Safety$() and $(italic)Permanence$().
The juicy lime makes you long for mother nature.$(br2)$(c_brown)Brown$() represents $(italic)Nature$() and $(italic)Stability$().
It makes you feel as if you are sitting on the top of a mountain, taking in the non-ending vastness of the world.$(br2)$(c_cyan)Cyan$() represents $(italic)Matter$() and $(italic)Integrity$().

This color looks to you like the defeated older brother of light gray. Whenever you look at it you get a little sad, but you do not know exactly why.$(br2)$(c_gray)Gray$() represents $(italic)Evanescence$().
This spectrum radiates inner peace.$(br2)$(c_green)Green$() represents $(italic)Balance$() and $(italic)Harmony$().
Looking at this color, you feel a sense of optimism, but also departure.$(br2)$(c_light_blue)Light Blue$() represents $(italic)Luck$() and $(italic)Piece$().

You know that feeling when you are sitting serenely, looking at the landscape, feeling life pass you by, and yet everything is okay? $(br2)$(c_light_gray)Light Gray$() represents $(italic)Change$(), but also $(italic)Quiet$().
It almost smells like a warm morning in spring. Or are you just imagining?$(br2)$(c_lime)Lime$() represents $(italic)Fertility$().
The soft magenta puts you in a calm and content, almost serene mood.$(br2)$(c_magenta)Magenta$() represents $(italic)Time$(), $(italic)Kindness$() and $(italic)Tolerance$().

The orange color reminds you of autumn and makes you feel a bit like you are sitting in a cozy armchair in front of a fireplace.$(br2)$(c_orange)Orange$() represents $(italic)Warmth$() and $(italic)Comfort$().
The bright, lively cotton candy pink makes you beam with joy.$(br2)$(c_pink)Pink$() represents $(italic)Happiness$(), $(italic)Health$() and $(italic)Admiration$().

This sight makes your mind go into high gear. It not only stimulates your thirst for knowledge, but also gives you creative ideas.$(br2)$(c_purple)Purple$() represents $(italic)Wisdom$() and $(italic)Creativity$().
You feel the urge and the desire to create something beautiful.$(br2)$(c_red)Red$() represents $(italic)Passion$() and $(italic)Willpower$().
You can not exactly put it into words. This spectrum radiates something unspeakably wonderful.$(br2)$(c_white)White$() represents $(italic)LIFE$(), $(italic)Light$() and $(italic)Purity$() .
The vibrant yellow is almost bursting with energy.$(br2)$(c_yellow)Yellow$() represents $(italic)ENERGY$() and $(italic)Joy$().
